title: Marketplace for tokenized property
description: Home buyers/sellers should be the two parties involved in a transfer. However, 10% of sale price is 3rd party profit. Research links: \[1\]
solution: Create a marketplace for buying/selling and **investing** in real estate via Title & Deed NFTs to remove profiting 3rd parties.
experience: Team has 5 yrs of real estate experience, built a solid base for the project, and dedicated to restructuring the unfair R.E system. \[1\]
